Thinking about written language

El verbo

Write the verbs from the list in the imperative mood following the example.

1. Loosen the soil on a surface of about 40 x 40 cm.

2. In the center, ............ a hole to place the tree's root.

3. ............ the tree from the very bottom of the stem. I don't ............ anything else nor ............ the root.

4. ............ that the tree is level with the ground and ............ the root with soil.

5. Compact the earth with the hands. It should not be too tight or too loose.

6. If the soil is poor, add organic fertilizer.

7. After planting, protect the tree from the action of herbivores or domestic animals.
